content.text: I like Nirvana, and I give everyone a fair chance. What about you?
I love fresh vegetables and Chinese food. I'm also afraid of not being able to accomplish my dreams.
I'm not close to my parents, but my family is very important to me. I'm also looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted with my family business.
That's great that you've accomplished your goals. I'm still working on mine.
What are you hoping to accomplish?
I want to be a professional baseball player.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you can accomplish it.
No problem! What's your favorite player?
My favorite player is Mike Trout.
He's a great player! I've seen him play a few times.
He's really amazing. I hope to be as good as him one day.
I'm sure you will be! You just have to keep working hard and never give up on your dreams.
